name: id
description: Primary key: Unique identifier for the pay period.

name: business_id
description: Foreign key: ID of the business associated with this pay period.

name: start_date
description: Start date of the pay period.

name: end_date
description: End date of the pay period.

name: pay_date
description: Date employees are paid for this period.

name: description
description: Optional description of the pay period (e.g., 'Weekly 2023-10-23').

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the pay period record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the pay period record was last updated.
